item.title: Can Floaters Cause Intrusive Thoughts?
item.description:
You’re not just seeing floaters — you’re thinking about them.
Over and over.
And somewhere along the way, your thoughts started spiraling:

“What if this never stops?”
“What if I go blind?”
“What if I go crazy from this?”

Now the floaters aren’t just visual — they’ve become mental landmines.

If you’re wondering “Can floaters cause intrusive thoughts?”, the answer is complex — but not uncommon.

Let’s unpack it.
